verses.verse: <S%H3478>Now,<s%> Israel, <S%H8085>listen<s%> to the <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and to the <S%H4941>ordinances,<s%> which I <S%H3925>teach<s%> <S%H6213>you,<s%> to do <S%H2421>them;<s%> that you may live, and go <S%H935>in<s%> and <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers,<s%> gives <S%H5414>you.<s%>

You shall not <S%H3254>add<s%> to the <S%H1697>word<s%> which I <S%H6680>command<s%> <S%H1639>you,<s%> neither shall you diminish from <S%H8104>it,<s%> that you may keep the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> which I command <S%H6680>you.<s%>

Your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> have <S%H7200>seen<s%> what <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> because of <S%H1187>Baal<s%> <S%H376>Peor;<s%> for all the men who <S%H310>followed<s%> <S%H1187>Baal<s%> <S%H3068>Peor,<s%> Yahweh your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> them from the midst of <S%H7130>you.<s%>
But you who were <S%H1695>faithful<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> are all <S%H2416>alive<s%> this <S%H3117>day.<s%>

<S%H7200>Behold,<s%> I have <S%H3925>taught<s%> you <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and <S%H4941>ordinances,<s%> even <S%H834>as<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> my <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H6213>me,<s%> that you should do so <S%H7130>in<s%> the midst of the <S%H776>land<s%> where you <S%H935>go<s%> in to possess <S%H3423>it.<s%>

<S%H8104>Keep<s%> therefore and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2451>them;<s%> for this is your wisdom and your <S%H998>understanding<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H5971>peoples,<s%> who shall <S%H8085>hear<s%> all these <S%H2706>statutes,<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> "Surely this <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%> is a <S%H2450>wise<s%> and <S%H995>understanding<s%> <S%H5971>people.<s%>"
For what <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%> is <S%H430>there,<s%> that has a god so <S%H7138>near<s%> to <S%H3068>them,<s%> as Yahweh our <S%H430>God<s%> is whenever we call on <S%H7121>him?<s%>

What <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%> is <S%H2706>there,<s%> that has statutes and <S%H4941>ordinances<s%> so <S%H6662>righteous<s%> as all this <S%H8451>law,<s%> which I <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you this <S%H3117>day?<s%>

Only take <S%H8104>heed<s%> to <S%H8104>yourself,<s%> and keep your <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H3966>diligently,<s%> lest you <S%H7911>forget<s%> the <S%H1697>things<s%> which your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H7200>saw,<s%> and lest they <S%H5493>depart<s%> from your <S%H3824>heart<s%> all the <S%H3117>days<s%> of your <S%H2416>life;<s%> but make them <S%H3045>known<s%> to your <S%H1121>children<s%> and your <S%H1121>children<s%>'s <S%H1121>children;<s%>

the <S%H3117>day<s%> that you <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> in <S%H2722>Horeb,<s%> when <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H6950>me,<s%> "Assemble <S%H6950>me<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and I will make them <S%H8085>hear<s%> my <S%H1697>words,<s%> that they may <S%H3925>learn<s%> to <S%H3372>fear<s%> me all the <S%H3117>days<s%> that they <S%H2416>live<s%> on the <S%H127>earth,<s%> and that they may <S%H3925>teach<s%> their <S%H1121>children.<s%>"

You came <S%H7126>near<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> under the <S%H2022>mountain;<s%> and the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H1197>burned<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%> to the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky,<s%> with <S%H6205>darkness,<s%> <S%H2822>cloud,<s%> and thick darkness.

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to you out of the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H784>fire:<s%> you <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H1697>words,<s%> but you <S%H7200>saw<s%> no <S%H8544>form;<s%> you <S%H2108>only<s%> heard a <S%H6963>voice.<s%>

He <S%H5046>declared<s%> to you his <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> which he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you to <S%H6213>perform,<s%> even the <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H1697>commandments;<s%> and he <S%H3789>wrote<s%> them on <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tables<s%> of <S%H68>stone.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> me at that <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H3925>teach<s%> you <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and <S%H4941>ordinances,<s%> that you might <S%H6213>do<s%> them in the <S%H776>land<s%> where you go <S%H5674>over<s%> to possess <S%H3423>it.<s%>

Take therefore <S%H3966>good<s%> <S%H8104>heed<s%> to <S%H5315>yourselves;<s%> for you <S%H7200>saw<s%> no kind of <S%H8544>form<s%> on the <S%H3117>day<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to you in <S%H2722>Horeb<s%> out of the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H784>fire.<s%>

Lest you <S%H7843>corrupt<s%> <S%H6213>yourselves,<s%> and make yourself an engraved <S%H6459>image<s%> in the <S%H8544>form<s%> of any <S%H5566>figure,<s%> the <S%H8403>likeness<s%> of <S%H2145>male<s%> or <S%H5347>female,<s%>
the <S%H8403>likeness<s%> of any <S%H929>animal<s%> that is on the <S%H776>earth,<s%> the <S%H8403>likeness<s%> of any <S%H3671>winged<s%> <S%H6833>bird<s%> that flies in the <S%H8064>sky,<s%>

the <S%H8403>likeness<s%> of anything that <S%H7430>creeps<s%> on the <S%H127>ground,<s%> the <S%H8403>likeness<s%> of any <S%H1710>fish<s%> that is in the <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H776>earth;<s%>

and lest you lift <S%H5375>up<s%> your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> to the <S%H8064>sky,<s%> and when you <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H8121>sun<s%> and the <S%H3394>moon<s%> and the <S%H3556>stars,<s%> even all the <S%H6635>army<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky,<s%> you are <S%H5080>drawn<s%> away and <S%H7812>worship<s%> <S%H5647>them,<s%> and serve <S%H3068>them,<s%> which Yahweh your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H2505>allotted<s%> to all the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> under the whole <S%H8064>sky.<s%>

But <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H3947>taken<s%> <S%H3318>you,<s%> and brought you forth out of the <S%H1270>iron<s%> <S%H3564>furnace,<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> to be to him a <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> as at this <S%H3117>day.<s%>

Furthermore <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> was <S%H599>angry<s%> with me for your <S%H1697>sakes,<s%> and <S%H7650>swore<s%> that I should not go <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> and that I should not <S%H935>go<s%> in to that <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> you for an <S%H5159>inheritance:<s%>

but I must <S%H4191>die<s%> in this <S%H776>land,<s%> I must not go <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan;<s%> but you shall go <S%H5674>over,<s%> and <S%H3423>possess<s%> that <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H776>land.<s%>

Take <S%H8104>heed<s%> to <S%H7911>yourselves,<s%> lest you forget the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> which he <S%H3772>made<s%> with <S%H6213>you,<s%> and make you an engraved <S%H6459>image<s%> in the <S%H8544>form<s%> of <S%H3605>anything<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has forbidden <S%H6680>you.<s%>
For <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> is a <S%H398>devouring<s%> <S%H784>fire,<s%> a <S%H7067>jealous<s%> <S%H430>God.<s%>

When you shall <S%H3205>father<s%> <S%H1121>children,<s%> and <S%H1121>children<s%>'s <S%H1121>children,<s%> and you shall have been <S%H3462>long<s%> in the <S%H776>land,<s%> and shall <S%H7843>corrupt<s%> <S%H6213>yourselves,<s%> and make an engraved <S%H6459>image<s%> in the <S%H8544>form<s%> of <S%H6213>anything,<s%> and shall do that which is <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> to provoke him to <S%H3707>anger;<s%>

I <S%H5749>call<s%> <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H776>earth<s%> to <S%H5749>witness<s%> against you this <S%H3117>day,<s%> that you shall <S%H4118>soon<s%> <S%H6>utterly<s%> <S%H6>perish<s%> from off the <S%H776>land<s%> whereunto you go <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> <S%H748>it;<s%> you shall not prolong your <S%H3117>days<s%> on <S%H8045>it,<s%> but shall utterly be <S%H8045>destroyed.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H6327>scatter<s%> you among the <S%H5971>peoples,<s%> and you shall be <S%H7604>left<s%> <S%H4962>few<s%> in <S%H4557>number<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> where <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> shall lead you <S%H5090>away.<s%>

There you shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%>'s <S%H3027>hands,<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%> and <S%H68>stone,<s%> which neither <S%H7200>see,<s%> nor <S%H8085>hear,<s%> nor <S%H398>eat,<s%> nor <S%H7306>smell.<s%>

But from there you shall <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and you shall <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H1875>him,<s%> when you search after him with all your <S%H3824>heart<s%> and with all your <S%H5315>soul.<s%>

When you are in <S%H6862>oppression,<s%> and all these <S%H1697>things<s%> have <S%H4672>come<s%> on <S%H319>you,<s%> in the latter <S%H3117>days<s%> you shall <S%H7725>return<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H8085>listen<s%> to his <S%H6963>voice:<s%>

for <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> is a <S%H7349>merciful<s%> <S%H430>God;<s%> he will not <S%H7503>fail<s%> <S%H7843>you,<s%> neither destroy <S%H7911>you,<s%> nor forget the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers<s%> which he swore to <S%H7650>them.<s%>

For <S%H7592>ask<s%> now of the <S%H3117>days<s%> that are <S%H7223>past,<s%> which <S%H1961>were<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3117>you,<s%> since the day that <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1254>created<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> on the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and from the one <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky<s%> to the <S%H1419>other,<s%> whether there has been anything as this great <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H8085>is,<s%> or has been heard like it?

Did a <S%H5971>people<s%> ever <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> speaking <S%H1696>out<s%> of the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H784>fire,<s%> as you have <S%H8085>heard,<s%> and <S%H2421>live?<s%>

Or has <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5254>tried<s%> to <S%H935>go<s%> and <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H1471>nation<s%> for himself from the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of another <S%H1471>nation,<s%> by <S%H4531>trials,<s%> by <S%H226>signs,<s%> and by <S%H4159>wonders,<s%> and by <S%H4421>war,<s%> and by a <S%H2389>mighty<s%> <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and by an <S%H5186>outstretched<s%> <S%H2220>arm,<s%> and by <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4172>terrors,<s%> according to all that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> for you in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> before your <S%H5869>eyes?<s%>
It was <S%H7200>shown<s%> to you so that you might <S%H3045>know<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is <S%H430>God.<s%> There is no one <S%H5750>else<s%> besides <S%H905>him.<s%>

Out of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> he made you to <S%H8085>hear<s%> his <S%H6963>voice,<s%> that he might <S%H3256>instruct<s%> <S%H776>you:<s%> and on earth he made you to <S%H7200>see<s%> his <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H784>fire;<s%> and you <S%H8085>heard<s%> his <S%H1697>words<s%> out of the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H784>fire.<s%>

Because he <S%H157>loved<s%> your <S%H1>fathers,<s%> therefore he <S%H977>chose<s%> their <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3318>them,<s%> and brought you out with his <S%H6440>presence,<s%> with his <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3581>power,<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%>

to drive <S%H3423>out<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> you <S%H1419>greater<s%> and <S%H6099>mightier<s%> than <S%H935>you,<s%> to bring you <S%H5414>in,<s%> to give you their <S%H776>land<s%> for an <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> as at this <S%H3117>day.<s%>

<S%H3045>Know<s%> therefore this <S%H3117>day,<s%> and <S%H7725>lay<s%> it to your <S%H3824>heart,<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> he is <S%H430>God<s%> in <S%H8064>heaven<s%> <S%H4605>above<s%> and on the earth <S%H776>beneath;<s%> there is none else.

You shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> his <S%H2706>statutes,<s%> and his <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> which I <S%H6680>command<s%> you this <S%H3117>day,<s%> that it may go <S%H3190>well<s%> with <S%H1121>you,<s%> and with your children <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H748>you,<s%> and that you may prolong your <S%H3117>days<s%> in the <S%H127>land,<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> gives <S%H5414>you,<s%> forever.
Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> set <S%H914>apart<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> toward the <S%H8121>sunrise;<s%>

that the <S%H7523>manslayer<s%> might <S%H5127>flee<s%> <S%H7523>there,<s%> who kills his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%> <S%H1097>unawares,<s%> and <S%H8130>didn't<s%> hate him in <S%H8543>time<s%> <S%H8032>past;<s%> and that <S%H5127>fleeing<s%> to <S%H259>one<s%> of <S%H411>these<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> he might <S%H2425>live:<s%>

<S%H1221>Bezer<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> in the <S%H4334>plain<s%> <S%H776>country,<s%> for the <S%H7206>Reubenites;<s%> and <S%H7216>Ramoth<s%> in <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> for the <S%H1425>Gadites;<s%> and <S%H1474>Golan<s%> in <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%> for the <S%H4520>Manassites.<s%>
This is the <S%H8451>law<s%> which <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7760>set<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%>

these are the <S%H5713>testimonies,<s%> and the <S%H2706>statutes,<s%> and the <S%H4941>ordinances,<s%> which <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> when they came <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%>

<S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> in the <S%H1516>valley<s%> over <S%H4136>against<s%> Beth <S%H1047>Peor,<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> who <S%H3427>lived<s%> at <S%H2809>Heshbon,<s%> whom <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5221>struck,<s%> when they came <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

They took his <S%H776>land<s%> in <S%H3423>possession,<s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H5747>Og<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> who were <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> toward the <S%H4217>sunrise;<s%>
from <S%H6177>Aroer,<s%> which is on the <S%H8193>edge<s%> of the <S%H5158>valley<s%> of the <S%H769>Arnon,<s%> even to <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H7865>Sion<s%> (the same is <S%H2768>Hermon<s%>),

and all the <S%H6160>Arabah<s%> <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> <S%H4217>eastward,<s%> even to the <S%H3220>sea<s%> of the <S%H6160>Arabah,<s%> under the <S%H794>slopes<s%> of <S%H6449>Pisgah.<s%>
